sentence.text: Immunohistochemical method was used to examine the immunoexpression of ADAM10 and microvessel density in 80 cases of oral squamous cell carcinoma (OSCC): without metastases - OSCC M(-) (n = 38), and with metastases - OSCC M(+) (n = 42), in 24 cases of oral leukoplakia (OLK), (15 cases with low-grade dysplasia - OLK-LG, and 9 cases with high-grade dysplasia - OLK-HG), and 19 controls.
These findings suggest that ADAM10 could potentially contribute to metastases of oral cancer.
